global.description_publish:
Your page is not saved! Click Publish to create a FREE
account and save your page.

info_message.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this?
info_message.user_package_is_expired: Your current package has expired and your access is limited. Please get a new package!

success_message.basic: Your requested command was performed successfully!

error_message.empty_fields: You must fill all the fields!
error_message.invalid_captcha: The captcha code is not valid!
error_message.file_upload: Something happened while uploading the image and we could not process it.
error_message.invalid_csrf_token: The action could not be finished because the protector has expired, please try again!
error_message.basic: We could not perform your requested command!

user_activation.subject: Welcome {{NAME}}! - Activation email
user_activation.body:
Hey there {{NAME}},

We are glad you joined us!

One more step and you are ready,

you just need to click the following link in order to join {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}

Activate your account

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_lost_password.subject: Reset your password - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_lost_password.body:
Hey {{NAME}},

This is your reset password link: Reset Password

If you did not request this, you can ignore it!

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_payment.subject: Payment received - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_payment.body:
Hey there,

This is a confirmation that your payment has been received by us.

Your account plan is now paid until {{PACKAGE_EXPIRATION_DATE}}!

You can also check all the payments you made, change your plan or cancel it.

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

admin_new_user_notification.subject: New User Registered!
admin_new_user_notification.body:
Hey!

A new user just registered to the website!

Welcome %s with the %s email to your website!

admin_new_payment_notification.subject: New Payment via %s of %s %s!
admin_new_payment_notification.body:
Hey!

A user just paid %s %s to the website!

Here's to more earnings!

package_settings.additional_global_domains: Additional Global Domains
package_settings.additional_global_domains_help: You get access to extra domains to use.
package_settings.custom_url: Custom Back-half
package_settings.custom_url_help: Instead of auto generated urls, like /a853we6, you get to choose your own
package_settings.deep_links: Deep linking
package_settings.deep_links_help: Provides the ability to enter deep links, like: steam://rungameid/id
package_settings.no_ads: No Ads
package_settings.no_ads_help: You won't see any ads on the platform and neither will ads be placed on your biolink pages
package_settings.removable_branding: Removable Biolinks Branding
package_settings.removable_branding_help: All the branding will be removed from your created Biolinks
package_settings.custom_branding: Custom Biolinks Branding
package_settings.custom_branding_help: Change and whitelabel the branding of your Biolinks
package_settings.custom_colored_links: Custom biolinks Colors
package_settings.custom_colored_links_help: You can choose your own custom colors for links inside of the biolink pages
package_settings.statistics: Indepth Statistics
package_settings.statistics_help: You get access to more advanced statistics for all your links
package_settings.google_analytics: Google Analytics
package_settings.google_analytics_help: Easy google analytics integration for your biolink pages
package_settings.facebook_pixel: Facebook Pixel
package_settings.facebook_pixel_help: Easy Facebook Pixel integration for your biolink pages
package_settings.custom_backgrounds: Custom Biolinks Backgrounds
package_settings.custom_backgrounds_help: You can add your own custom Biolink page backgrounds
package_settings.verified: Verified Checkmark
package_settings.verified_help: You will get the verified checkmark for all your biolink pages
package_settings.scheduling: Links Scheduling
package_settings.scheduling_help: Prepare all your links to go live when you specify
package_settings.seo: SEO
package_settings.seo_help: Customize the meta tags for your biolink pages
package_settings.utm: UTM Parameters
package_settings.utm_help: Easily adjust the UTM parameters for all your links
package_settings.socials: Socials
package_settings.socials_help: Get access to add quick social links in the footer of your biolink page
package_settings.fonts: Fonts
package_settings.fonts_help: Get access to multiple fonts to use for your biolink page
package_settings.unlimited_projects_limit: Unlimited Projects
package_settings.unlimited_biolinks_limit: Unlimited Biolink Pages
package_settings.unlimited_links_limit: Unlimited Shorted Links
package_settings.unlimited_domains_limit: Unlimited Custom Domains

index.title: Multiple Bio Links for Instagram
index.header:
Get the most of your
Instagram Bio Link
index.subheader: Create shorted links, unique biolink pages and get proper statistics of your visitors.

presentation.subheader: Create and manage multiple Biolink Pages for your team from a single dashboard.

presentation2.subheader: One project for you, one for your friend, one for your company. One account is all you need.

presentation3.subheader: Yes! You can use our service as a shortener as well.

presentation4.subheader: Add your own touch to your biolinks page with our editor and stand out from the crowd.

presentation5.subheader: Get to know your audience with our detailed statistics and if those are not enough, you can even integrate Google Analytics.

setup.header: Easy Setup & Integrate on any Website.
setup.description:
These are just a few examples.
Any website can run our notifications.

tools.subheader: Choose from a wide variety of notifications.
tools.preview_description: Choose any type of notification and preview it live.

pricing.subheader: Choose and get your plan based on your needs.

input.title: Title
input.icon_help: Font Awesome icon, leave empty for no icon.
input.order_help: Easily arrange pages categories with numbers. Displaying on the website is ascendent.

admin_pages_category_delete_modal.subheader: All the pages inside this category will be deleted as well. This action cannot be undone.

input.title: Title
input.order_help: Easily arrange pages with numbers. Displaying on the website is ascendent.

table.name: Package Name
table.custom_help: Custom packages can be defined directly from the User Update page.

main.subheader: Define the main settings of the plan.

trial.days_help: The number of days that the trial plan can be used.

main.name: Name

package.subheader: Choose which features to enable for this package.
package.biolinks_limit_help: The total amount of biolink pages that a user can create. Set -1 for unlimited.
package.links_limit_help: The total amount of links that a user can create (shorted links). Set -1 for unlimited.
package.domains_limit_help: The total amount of custom domains that a user can add. Set -1 for unlimited.
package.additional_global_domains_help: Enabling this will make all people having this package be able to use all the additional global domains.
package.custom_url_help: Enabling this will give the ability to the user to have custom url aliases instead of auto generated ones.
package.deep_links_help: Enabling this will give the ability to the user to use deep links to point to specific apps instead of only http and https urls.
package.no_ads_help: Enabling this will make all people having this package to not see any ads.
package.removable_branding_help: This gives the option for people to remove branding from the biolinks footer.
package.custom_branding_help: This gives the option for people to add their custom branding for the biolinks footer.
package.custom_colored_links_help: Gives the user the ability to customize the color of their biolinks links
package.statistics_help: Gives the user the ability to check more in depth statistics and select the time frame
package.google_analytics_help: Gives the user the ability to add Google Analytics on their biolinks pages.
package.facebook_pixel_help: Gives the user the ability to add Facebook Pixel on their biolinks pages.
package.custom_backgrounds_help: Gives the user the ability to add custom backgrounds on their biolinks pages ( colors, gradients and actual images ).
package.verified_help: Gives the user the verified checkmark on all their Biolink pages.
package.scheduling_help: Gives the user the ability to schedule links.
package.seo_help: Gives the user the ability to change the Title and Meta Description of Biolink pages.
package.utm_help: Gives the user the ability to set global UTM parameters for all the links inside of a Biolink page.
package.socials_help: Gives the user the ability to add his social media accounts and be displayed below the biolink links.
package.fonts_help: Gives the user the ability to pick a font of his liking from the list of extra fonts.

update_users_package_settings.subheader: By updating the package subscribers you will overwrite all their current settings with the saved settings of this package.

main.title: Website title
main.default_language_help: To add more languages, please consult the documentation.
main.logo_help: jpg, jpeg, png and svg accepted. Recommended size: Max height of 40px and transparrent.
main.favicon_help: jpg, jpeg, png and ico accepted.
main.register_is_enabled_help: Disable / Enable User Registration depending on your usage of the platform.
main.index_url_help: Set the full custom index url ( ex: https://google.com/ ) if you want to completely disable the default landing page of the product. Helpful when you want to have your own landing page. Leave empty to disable.
main.terms_and_conditions_url_help: Link to the terms and conditions of the website. Can be a link created with the Pages creator from the sidebar.
main.privacy_policy_url_help: Link to the privacy policy of the website. Can be a link created with the Pages creator from the sidebar.

links.shortener_is_enabled_help: Enabling the link shortener system will give your users the ability to shorten links on their projects.
links.domains_is_enabled_help: Enabling this will give your users the ability to add custom domains.
links.blacklisted_domains_help: Comma separated values of domains ( domain.com, domain2.com ..etc ). People will not be able to shorten / add any domain that is included in this list.
links.blacklisted_keywords_help: Comma separated values of domains ( word1, word2, word3 ..etc ). People will not be able to use any custom url that is included in this list.
links.phishtank_help: Phishtank.com is an online database of phishing URL's. The integration will enable URL's checking before users are trying to short them and make sure they are not phishing sites.
links.phishtank_api_key_help: Please refer to the Documentation to find out where to get the key.
links.google_safe_browsing_help: The integration will enable URL's checking before users are trying to short them and make sure they are not suspicious or dangerous sites.
links.google_safe_browsing_api_key_help: Please refer to the Documentation to find out where to get the key.

payment.is_enabled_help: Disabling the payment system will remove all the options for the users to upgrade their accounts or see any payment related information.
payment.brand_name_help: The brand name will be used for displaying the brand when users purchase via payment gates. (ex: paypal)
payment.currency_help: Currency Code for the payments (ex: USD).
payment.codes_is_enabled_help: Enabling the discount codes system will enable users to add a discount code created from the admin panel, before they checkout.
payment.paypal_help: Please refer to the Documentation to find out where to get the keys.
payment.stripe_help: Please refer to the Documentation to find out where to get the keys.

business.subheader: These details will be used when generating invoices for the user.
business.invoice_is_enabled_help: This option will determine if users will be able to see invoices for their payments or not.

captcha.recaptcha_is_enabled_help: When Google Recaptcha is disabled a more basic captcha will be available.

smtp.host_help: If there are no values entered in this field then the system will try to use the default mail function.

custom.head_js_help: Add your own tracking js code ( ex: Google Analytics ).
custom.head_css_help: Add custom CSS in case you want to overwrite certain styles of the website.

email_notifications.emails_help: Emails that will receive a notification when one of the bottom actions are performed. Add valid email addresses separated by a comma.
email_notifications.new_user_help: Receive an email when a new users registers to the website.
email_notifications.new_payment_help: Receive an email when a new payment is successfully processed.
